title: SlamdunQ Cricket
summary: Turn your Smart Watch into your very own Cricket Coach
description: Slamdunq cricket is a one of a kind app aimed to help you improve your bowling skills.Our carefully designed matrices such as – run up speed, arm speed, angle of deviation, wrist rotation and release height will up your bowling techniques whether it’s a pace bowler or spin bowler. A real-time feedback, bowling tips and 3D animation of your bowling action bring cricket coaching right to your wrist / phone.So strap on your watch, power our app and bring down those wickets Supported devices:1. Samsung gear S22. LG-G and LG-Urbane watches
descriptionHTML:
Slamdunq cricket is a one of a kind app aimed to help you improve your bowling skills.

Our carefully designed matrices such as – run up speed, arm speed, angle of deviation, wrist rotation and release height will up your bowling techniques whether it’s a pace bowler or spin bowler. A real-time feedback, bowling tips and 3D animation of your bowling action bring cricket coaching right to your wrist / phone.

So strap on your watch, power our app and bring down those wickets

Supported devices:
1. Samsung gear S2
2. LG-G and LG-Urbane watches
comments: Login not activated Signed up and got mail but when I click the link it says account not activated. Also why do you need access to my contacts? Privacy violation.
My login details don't work it keeps on saying the app is in development mode and it isnt working but it looks like a decent app and I really want it to work so PLZ help..
This app is great! I don't know why people are saying it is bad, I use my Samsung gear fit 2 to calculate on the bowls, and it works fine
Doesn't recors It doesn't record my bowels at all. I've tried numerous times and it has not recorded one. I've had my phone on me so that it is in Bluetooth range but still nothing. Not happy

It's poor. I can't even login. It's asking for the email even when i have given it. I can't even login via Facebook or Google.  I am using a Samsung gear fit2. Please help me with a solution. I want to try this...!
Not working at all. If it even can't make me login then how come it will be useful to do analysis of my bowling.
